site_title: Crane’s Egg by Richard L. Alexander

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold an Origami Crane’s Egg designed by Richard L. Alexander. It's a simple Modular origami model. Less than a minute origami. Enjoy!!! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Richard L. Alexander
block_list.body: • Crane’s Egg by Richard L. Alexander
